overview: On April 30, 2004, the day the Czech Republic joins the European Union, three friends meet in Prague. To get away from the big media production, they leave town for a cabin in the mountains. But once there, they realize that what they were running away from is already inside them, a part of them. Their reunion is a staged production. Are they living their lives or just playing roles...?
title: Hastig werden wir leiser
